item.description:
Time is 5:30 pm - 9:00 pm  Host is Jen Ezzell,  CT Tea Party Patriots. FB event info below.

 

One of our fellow Patriots, Harold Harris, is sponsoring a FREE seminar entitled: Economic Literacy & Free Market Economics This seminar will be run by Loren Spicack: "The Free Market Warrior." Loren has been traveling the country and has conducted 100 presentations in 1...4 states trying to improve economic literacy through his seminar.

Here is a short video, of Loren:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fZZhiF6z2sg&feature=related

This seminar is given over two evenings and divided into four parts:
1. Intellectual and Historical Roots of Socialism: Understanding its broad appeal
2. The Intellectual and Historical Roots of Capitalism: Why we'll starve without it
3. The Source of Value: Two contrasting views with implications
4. Applying the Principles of Freedom to the Problems of Today: Taxes, Education, Health Care, Protectionism and outsourcing, population, Natural Resources and many more
We hope to see you in Glastonbury, bring family and friends to this important seminar.

 

Any questions find Jen on FB or ask them in the event comments.

barbara g.
item.name: Jen Ezzell Economic Freedom Lecture in Glastonbury on Nov 21
